title: Who is a better musician, Lil Peep or XXXTentacion? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both are very talented in an extremely similar & dissimilar manner - the energy is synthesized but each artist is unique in their own right. I was fortunate to see both of them live - and I can honestly say - 1. hands down amazing from the pit to the fan connection to musical performance etc….& 2. these two can never be replicated. And while I say they are of equal talent I think fans and artists can all agree XXX took performance to that next level of “unfathomable” that hasn’t been seen since the days of Jim Morrison - Hope this helps.  (Courtesy Revolt TV, YouTube, Ski Mask the Slump God, DJ Scheme, Rolling Loud). Some original content on the way to expand the answer provided. JW
